remarks: Homotopy invariance of path concatenation.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 15-Jun-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
pcohtpy.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` 1 ) = ( G ` 0 ) ) $.
pcohtpy.5 $e |- ( ph -> F ( ~=ph ` J ) H ) $.
pcohtpy.6 $e |- ( ph -> G ( ~=ph ` J ) K ) $.
pcohtpy $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( *p ` J ) G ) ( ~=ph ` J ) ( H ( *p ` J ) K ) ) $.
